# article17

The goal of article17 is to contain the functions commonly used within the scripts used to transform the species and habitats between the data capture spreadsheets, European reporting tool and aggregate spreadsheets.

## Installation

You can install the latest version of article17 from github using:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jncc/article17")
```
